title: AWS ECS java.lang.IllegalStateException: Unable to create folder at path '/tmp/vertx-cache/1082414833831755185'
body:
### Describe the bug

Hi, some tool od security team recommended me to set `"readonlyRootFilesystem": true` in my ECS task definition. Unfortunately quarkus cannot start with it and I got `java.lang.IllegalStateException: Unable to create folder at path '/tmp/vertx-cache/1082414833831755185'` for my understanding quarkus needs it to store caches, is there any workaround or I have to just not set `readonlyRootFilesystem` to `true`
